LANGUAGE.LABEL: Oops! The selected function is not currently available.
CALCULATE TRAINING BONUSES: Click the "Process" button below to create training bonuses for all new affiliate payments in the specified date range below.
CALCULATE MONTHLY BONUSES: Click the "Process" button below to create monthly bonuses for all monthly affiliate payments in the specified date range below.
CREATE PAYOUTS: Click the "Process" button below to create payouts for all unpaid bonuses up to the date specified below.
MARK PENDING PAYOUTS PAID: Click the "Process" button below to update the status of all pending payouts to paid, up to the date specified below and totaling $30+ per affiliate.
CALCULATE REFERRALS: Click the "Process" button below to calculate all affiliate's personal and team referrals.
CALCULATE ADVANCEMENT: Click the "Process" button below to calculate advancements. Confirm that the referrals are current with the "Calculate Referrals" process.
POST MONTHLY REFERRALS: Click the "Process" button below to post all affiliate's currrent personal and team referrals with the date specified below.
CALCULATE QUALIFIED MEMBERS: Click the "Process" button below to calculate all active affiliates that are qualified to receive bonuses or that are "Qualify" locked after the date specified below.

EXPORT PENDING PAYOUTS: Click the "Process" button below to create payout files stored in the "Payouts" folder, for ACH transactions and paper check printing. Pending payouts will be processed up to the date specified below and totaling $30+ per affiliate.

CREAT PAYMENT CREDITS: Click the "Process" button below to create payment credits for all affiliates with bill dates due within the next 30 days that have sufficient earned commissions that have not been paid yet.
VALUES CARD MAILING LIST: Click the "Process" button below to view a list of new members with mailing addresses to receive a Values Card.
VALUES CARD MARK IN PROCESS: Click the "Process" button below to mark all new members with mailing addresses "In Process" to receive a Values Card.
VALUES CARD MARK MAILED: Click the "Process" button below to mark all "In Process" Values Card mailings as "Mailing Complete".
DECLINED PAYMENTS: Click the "Process" button below to view a list of members with declined payments.
